name: GMKonnect
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, turn off the light”
”Alexa, set the light to green please”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can use the APP to control smart lights, smart plug etc smart device in your house.

GM Konnect control and scene your smart devices at home

* Alexa, turn on the light
* Alexa, turn off the light
* Alexa, dim the light
* Alexa, brighten the light
* Alexa, set the light to 20 percent
* Alexa, set the light to green please
* Alexa, set the light to cool white please
